spinfo.tm.util

Class ResultWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • spinfo.tm.util.ResultWriter

  • public class ResultWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to write the extraction and evaluation results to human readable files.
    Author:
    neumannm

      Write the results of automatic extraction (by means of a classifier) to a .csv file (data separated by tabs, so technically tsv).

    • Method Detail

      • writeManualExtractionResults

        public static void writeManualExtractionResults(java.util.Map<Paragraph,java.util.Set<SlotFiller>> allResults,
                                java.lang.String originClassName)
        Write the results of manual extraction (by means of pattern matching or dependency parser) to a .csv file (data separated by tabs, so technically tsv).
        Parameters:
        allResults - mapping of paragraphs to the phrases that have been extracted
        originClassName - class that generated the results (to be used for output filename)

      • writeEvaluationResults

        public static void writeEvaluationResults(float precision,
                          float recall,
                          float f1,
                          java.lang.String originClassName)
        Write the evaluation results to a text (.txt) file specifying precision, recall and F1 score.
        Parameters:
        precision - precision score
        recall - recall score
        f1 - F1 score
        originClassName - class that generated the results (to be used for output filename)

      • writeClassificationExtractionResults

        public static void writeClassificationExtractionResults(java.util.Map<Paragraph,java.util.List<PotentialSlotFillingAnchor>> allResults,
                                        java.lang.String originClassName)
        Write the results of automatic extraction (by means of a classifier) to a .csv file (data separated by tabs, so technically tsv).
        Parameters:
        allResults - mapping of paragraphs to the tokens that were classified as anchors for competence phrases
        originClassName - class that generated the results (to be used for output filename)
